title: Four shot in North Lawndale
content:
Four people were shot Sunday afternoon in the North Lawndale neighborhood on the West Side.
The shooting happened in the 4100 block of West Roosevelt at 1:25 p.m., according to Chicago Police. A male walked up and fired shots before taking off in a vehicle.
A 24-year-old man was shot in the leg and foot and a 25-year-old woman was shot in both legs, police said. Both were taken to Mount Sinai Hospital, where their conditions stabilized.
A 22-year-old man and a 21-year-old man were both shot in the hip and taken in serious condition to Stroger Hospital.
A police source said all the men shot are documented gang members.
